narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Pyra Med Health Services LLC is a Home Health provider based in San Antonio, TX. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $67.6M in Medicaid payments across 213K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $67.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
